data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chisholm, Leslie A., Whittington, Ian D. (2006): Revision of Capsaloides (Monogenea: Capsalidae) with a redescription of C. magnaspinosus Price, 1939 from the nasal tissue of Tetrapterus audax (Istiophoridae) collected off Nelson Bay, New South Wales, Australia. Zootaxa 1160: 1-20, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.172308
